thread.title: How to keep fit while travelling
thread.title_full: How to keep fit while travelling

title: How to keep fit while travelling
text:
How to keep fit while travelling Mon, 28 Sep 2015 1:44 PM Share Your Email Credit: Supri Suharjoto/Shutterstock.com 
Keeping up with your fitness regime while travelling can be quite difficult. After all, you can't lug your equipment around with you and you don't necessarily know all the local jogging routes. 
That's why Swissotel has come up with a list of exercises you can do in the comfort of your hotel room. 
The list of exercises includes yoga poses, pilates and some resistance exercises. 
You don't need any equipment - just your own body. 
The exercises are also brief, so that you can easily fit them in between outings. 
Have a look at the handy Swissotel infographic below: Produced by Swissotel Hotels & Resorts Related Articles
